name: plagia
author: Shayma Braham

sections.description:
a plugin that detect plagiarism in the content .
we use a 3rd party api as a service to get the response after sending a content .
our service have same utilities provided as our plugin .

you must be signed up in https://logicielantiplagiat.fr and after creating an account we give you an API key that will be used in the plugin in order to activate the service .

the service : https://logicielantiplagiat.fr
the terms of use : https://logicielantiplagiat.fr/check/conditions
sections.changelog:
v0.9.1
fix bugs about default languages and location parametres

v0.9.2

change some interface issues

v0.9.3

fix bugs about plugin database tables
